name: Verbond van Belgische Tuinbouwco√∂peraties
goal:
VBT represents and defends, both nationally and internationally, the interests of Belgian producer cooperatives in the fruit and vegetable sector.
Where necessary it works in conjunction with other organisations, federations or relevant stakeholders.
VBT also offers its members a platform for consultation and exchange of views.
Furthermore, VBT provides sector-relevant information to its members and may, in specific domains, act as service provider.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trade
euInitiatives: Common Agricultural Policy - Marketing organisation for fruit and vegetables; food safety; sustainability
